alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Lewis; Mason; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 8:26AM EST until January 03 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Mason County in northern Kentucky... Robertson County in northern Kentucky... Northwestern Lewis County in northeastern Kentucky... Southern Bracken County in northern Kentucky... Southeastern Brown County in southwestern Ohio... Southwestern Adams County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 900 AM EST. * At 825 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Brooksville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Maysville, Washington, West Union, Manchester, Ripley, Aberdeen, Lewisburg, Brooksville, Rome, Mount Olivet, Germantown, Sardis, Concord, Trinity, Murphysville, Dunkinsville, Stonewall, Bradysville, Rectorville and Powersville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
